Title: Charles Hubert 3850 Mechanical Picture Frame Pocket Watch
Description: Charles Hubert 3850 Mechanical Picture Frame Pocket Watch Features: 17 jewel Mechanical movementSkeleton dial with roman numeralsChrome finish brass 48 mm hunter case with a matching curb chainDeluxe gift boxPhoto insert on inside of front cover Product Details: Product Dimensions: 5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inchesShipping Weight: 10.4 ouncesItem model number: 3850Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description This Charles-Hubert Paris pocket watch comes with a lifetime movement warranty against manufacturing defects. Features include a photo insert on inside of front cover, 17 jewel mechanical movement, 48mm hunter case, matching chain, skeleton dial with roman numerals, and a deluxe gift box. Since 1990, Charles- Hubert Pans has been a major influence in the United States watch industry. By including both retro and contemporary designs in its line, Charles-Hubert Paris has established a large and loyal following. With its unprecedented Lifetime Warranties, exceptional quality standards and affordable pricing, the future looks very bright for Charles-Hubert Paris.
